00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 #include "ht32_board_config.h"
00032 
00033 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00034   * @{
00035   */
00036

00045 
00046 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 void TM_Configuration(void);
00048 
00049 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00050 u32 CH_Frequency[4];
00051 u32 CH_DeltaCCR[4];
00052 
00053 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00054 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00055   * @brief  Main program.
00056   * @retval None
00057   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00058 int main(void)
00059 {
00060   TM_Configuration();
00061 
00062   while (1);
00063 }
00064 
00065 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00066   * @brief  Configure the Timer.
00067   * @retval None
00068   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00069 void TM_Configuration(void)
00070 {
00071   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00072     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00073     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO = 1;
00074     CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_COMP_IPN = 1;
00075     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00076   }
00077 
00078   /* Configure AFIO mode as TM function                                                                     */
00079   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_COMP_CH0_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_COMP_CH0_AFIO_PIN, HTCFG_COMP_AFIO_FUN);
00080   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_COMP_CH1_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_COMP_CH1_AFIO_PIN, HTCFG_COMP_AFIO_FUN);
00081   #if (LIBCFG_TM_SCTM_2CHANNEL == 0)
00082   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_COMP_CH2_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_COMP_CH2_AFIO_PIN, HTCFG_COMP_AFIO_FUN);
00083   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_COMP_CH3_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_COMP_CH3_AFIO_PIN, HTCFG_COMP_AFIO_FUN);
00084   #endif
00085   { /* Time base configuration                                                                              */
00086 
00087     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00088        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00089        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00090     */
00091     TM_TimeBaseInitTypeDef TimeBaseInit;
00092 
00093     TimeBaseInit.Prescaler = HTCFG_TM_PRESCALER - 1;                      // Timer clock = CK_AHB / 2000
00094     TimeBaseInit.CounterReload = 65535;
00095     TimeBaseInit.RepetitionCounter = 0;
00096     TimeBaseInit.CounterMode = TM_CNT_MODE_UP;
00097     TimeBaseInit.PSCReloadTime = TM_PSC_RLD_IMMEDIATE;
00098     TM_TimeBaseInit(HTCFG_COMP_PORT, &TimeBaseInit);
00099   }
00100 
00101   /* Compute the channels compare match delta value.
00102      Channel 0 frequency = 100 Hz
00103      Channel 1 frequency = 500 Hz
00104      Channel 2 frequency = 1000 Hz
00105      Channel 3 frequency = 2000 Hz
00106   */
00107   CH_Frequency[0] = 100;
00108   CH_DeltaCCR[0] = (SystemCoreClock / HTCFG_TM_PRESCALER) / CH_Frequency[0] / 2;
00109   CH_Frequency[1] = 500;
00110   CH_DeltaCCR[1] = (SystemCoreClock / HTCFG_TM_PRESCALER) / CH_Frequency[1] / 2;
00111   #if (LIBCFG_TM_SCTM_2CHANNEL == 0)
00112   CH_Frequency[2] = 1000;
00113   CH_DeltaCCR[2] = (SystemCoreClock / HTCFG_TM_PRESCALER) / CH_Frequency[2] / 2;
00114   CH_Frequency[3] = 2000;
00115   CH_DeltaCCR[3] = (SystemCoreClock / HTCFG_TM_PRESCALER) / CH_Frequency[3] / 2;
00116   #endif
00117 
00118   { /* Channel n output configuration                                                                       */
00119 
00120     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00121        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00122        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00123     */
00124     TM_OutputInitTypeDef OutInit;
00125 
00126     OutInit.OutputMode = TM_OM_MATCH_TOGGLE;
00127     OutInit.Control = TM_CHCTL_ENABLE;
00128     OutInit.ControlN = TM_CHCTL_DISABLE;
00129     OutInit.Polarity = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00130     OutInit.PolarityN = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00131     OutInit.IdleState = MCTM_OIS_LOW;
00132     OutInit.IdleStateN = MCTM_OIS_HIGH;
00133     OutInit.AsymmetricCompare = 0;
00134 
00135     OutInit.Channel = TM_CH_0;
00136     OutInit.Compare = CH_DeltaCCR[0];
00137     TM_OutputInit(HTCFG_COMP_PORT, &OutInit);
00138 
00139     OutInit.Channel = TM_CH_1;
00140     OutInit.Compare = CH_DeltaCCR[1];
00141     TM_OutputInit(HTCFG_COMP_PORT, &OutInit);
00142     #if (LIBCFG_TM_SCTM_2CHANNEL == 0)
00143     OutInit.Channel = TM_CH_2;
00144     OutInit.Compare = CH_DeltaCCR[2];
00145     TM_OutputInit(HTCFG_COMP_PORT, &OutInit);
00146 
00147     OutInit.Channel = TM_CH_3;
00148     OutInit.Compare = CH_DeltaCCR[3];
00149     TM_OutputInit(HTCFG_COMP_PORT, &OutInit);
00150     #endif
00151   }
00152 
00153   #if (LIBCFG_TM_SCTM_2CHANNEL)
00154   /* Enable TM channel 0 ~ 1 compare match interrupts                                                       */
00155   TM_IntConfig(HTCFG_COMP_PORT, TM_INT_CH0CC | TM_INT_CH1CC, ENABLE);
00156   #else
00157   /* Enable TM channel 0 ~ 3 compare match interrupts                                                       */
00158   TM_IntConfig(HTCFG_COMP_PORT, TM_INT_CH0CC | TM_INT_CH1CC | TM_INT_CH2CC | TM_INT_CH3CC, ENABLE);
00159   #endif
00160   NVIC_EnableIRQ(HTCFG_COMP_IRQn);
00161 
00162   /* Enable TM                                                                                              */
00163   TM_Cmd(HTCFG_COMP_PORT, ENABLE);
00164 }
00165 
00166 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00167 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00168   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00169   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00170   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00171   * @retval None
00172   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00173 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00174 {
00175   /*
00176      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00177      Debug message can be added here.
00178      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00179   */
00180 
00181   while (1)
00182   {
00183   }
00184 }
00185 #endif
00186

00189   * @}
00190   */
